Utterance: Hi, Miss Watson, abar dekha hobe. Dekhun, ami khushi je apni fire eshechen. Apnar check-up er pore amra je rokte kaj korechi tar phalaphol ami ekhon peyechi.
Thik ache.
Aar amra je kono kichur upore jawar age ami satyee apnar kach theke jinisguli kivabe cholche ebong apni ki niye udvigno ta janate chaiyechhilam.
Acha, mane, ami, ami tader somporke kautukhli karon ami khub bhalo chhilam na, thik ache. Ami khub, khub bhalo chhilam na. Ami gato shoptahe ami kichu rokt nikshep korechi.
Eta ki prothombar ghoteche?
Haan, prothombar. Mane, ami gato shoptahante tokhon rokt chhurre felchi. Abar, gatkal. Tai kharap kichu ghoteche. Ami jani kichu kharap hochhe.
Apnar ki mone hochhe?
Ki cancer thik ami mone kori ami sambhabot cancer hoyeche ami na ami khub bhalo korchi na ami shudhu matha byatha dekhechi ebong ami shudhu chhilam.
Ei kichu ber korar chesta kora jak. Thik ache. Apni jokhon bolchhilen je apni blabari chhurrechen, ujjol lal rokt chhurrechen ebong eti ki chhoto dag, boro dag-er moto chhilo?
Eta chhilo ekta toilet praay bhore yachchhilo temonta chhilo na. Ami eto chhiloam na je eti joteshtho chhilo je ami toilet-e eti dekhte pachhi, ebong ami chhurre felechhilam.
Aar apnar ki onno kono uposorg chhilo?

Dekhun, ami bujhte pari apni keno chintit. Thik ache, karon rokt nikshep kora bhitikar, ebong mazrati gham-e bheje utha. Setao thik mone hochhe na. Amake apnake koyekti prashna jijnasha korte din ja jinisguli byakhya korte sahayata korte pare. Apni khon apnar shesh paniyo pano korechen?

Tale amake bolo eti apni kivabe sahayyo kore.
Eta shudhu odhyon amake odhyon kore jemon ami achi, apni janen, ami sob somoy kampchi. Ami thik moto,
Tai diner belay, nijekete shanto bodh korar jonno odhyon kore. Apni shesh porjonto koto paniyo panochen?

Kokhono kokhono jodi ami sotti'i anubhob kori je amar pet sotti'i kharap, ami cider pan korbo. Tai je tar cider ba bhodka karon

Ebong apni kokhono sokale emon anubhuti pan je kichu lok boronno kore je tara khub birkutikor bodh kore jege othe. Tader shanto hoiar jonno ekti paniyo proyojon. Hyan. Eta amar jonno kaj kore je shudhumatro jinis moto. Je kon kaj, khub. Tai got shoptahe, apni ki mone koren apni beshi pan korchen?

Tumi ki jano, ek dhore naimittik aschhilo ebong se, se moolot bolechhilo je se ar amar sathe thakte parbe na karon ami khub beshi pan kori. Ebong tai ami chesta korechi. Ami chesta korechhilam. Ami chhilam, bhal, hyan, ebong tarpor se chole gel. Tai ke jotno kore, tai na? Mane, tai na?
Apni alcohol somporke nijeke doshi bodh korchhen.
Ami amar boner jonno doshi bodh kori, tai na? Ami doshi bodh kori je ami pachhondh korte pari na ami thik pari na. Ami jemon pari na take dakhteo pari na.

Jodi ami, jodi ami etike eksathe tante pari,

Karon apni amake ja bolchen ta theke ami ja bujhte perechi ta hol je modhyopan apnar jonno ek ti nirdisht proyozon metate sahayyo kore, ei somosto jinisgulike eksathe rakhar chesta korar khetre ebong rakhar chesta korar khetre ek ti proyozon puron kore. Tumi shanto ho. Kintu eki shomoye, eti apnake somsyae pore. Somporke'r khetre eti somsya pore, tobe apni keno rokt nikshep korchen tar jonno eti sambhavot akt bakhya'o noy keno ami je lab folafolguli peyechi ta apnar jonno khub beshi poriman'e alcoholer sathe samanjasyopurno handle korrar jonno sharir. Sotti'i, sotti'i, ebong er ortho hol, adarshbhabe, amra eti somporke kichhu korar upay khujte ber korte ekshathe kaj korte jachchi.
